results.title: Introducing Australian football [Italian version]
results.creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Frank Bagnall and Malcolm Smith
results.brief_description: The Victorian Football League’s 1972 Grand Final, between the Carlton and Richmond teams is the dramatic background used to explain the rules and techniques of play. Includes slow-motion and free-frame techniques, playing positions, rules, penaltiesand the five types of kick employed. Commentary in Italian.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Frank Bagnall and Malcolm Smith
results.description: The Victorian Football League’s 1972 Grand Final, between the Carlton and Richmond teams is the dramatic background used to explain the rules and techniques of play. results.title: Introduced animals of New Zealand
results.brief_description: The vast number of imported deer, chamois, that, pigs, goats, wallabies, opossums, rabbits and hares with no natural enemies tends to denude the New Zealand countryside of natural forest and plant protection resulting in erosion off hillsides and flooding of lower farm lands.
results.description: The vast number of imported deer, chamois, that, pigs, goats, wallabies, opossums, rabbits and hares with no natural enemies tends to denude the New Zealand countryside of natural forest and plant protection resulting in erosion off hillsides and flooding of lower farm lands.

results.title: Intravenous therapy techniques
results.creator_credit: Morgana Films, Ross Matthews and Peter Dodds
results.brief_description: Made in the Intensive Care Unit of St Vincent’s Hospital, Melbourne this instructional film covers the insertion of catheter over needle; central venous catheterisation; measurement of central venous pressure; basic care in intravenous therapy; changing infusion bottle; infusion additives; infusion blockage; removal of infusion apparatus; alternative apparatus.

results.title: Intravenous anaesthesia. Part 2
results.creator_credit: Realist Films, ICI (GB) and Yvonne Fletcher
results.brief_description: As in Part 1, pentothal is chosen as the anaesthetic to be demonstrated. More advanced techniques are shown than those in Part 1, and, in particular, the use of pentothal as an adjuvant to nitrous oxide.

results.title: Intravenous anaesthesia. Part 1
results.creator_credit: Realist Films, ICI (GB) and Yvonne Fletcher
results.brief_description: Deals with the general principles of administering intravenous anaesthetic, including demonstrations of essential apparatus, technique of venepuncture, course of anaesthesia with sodium pentothal, and the dangers against which to guard.

results.title: Intrapreneurs
results.brief_description: Looks at the work of four entrepreneurs - people who act out the role of entrepreneur within an organisation, showing innovation and imagination to create new profits.

results.title: Intransit
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Mike Daly and Isabel Perez
results.brief_description:
A boy journeys into his own dark underworld where he is confronted by the vengeful father of his imagination.
Features Louis Westgarth as Ben, James Hagen as Ben’s father and Humphrey Westgarth as young Ben.
